attributes.action: introduce regulations into parlimentary procedure to reintroduce the concept of parliamentary democracy into British Poltics and so prevent the Prime Minister becoming an unelected president
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become increasingly obvious that the role of the Prime Minister has become more presidential with the consequential weakeningof parliament. Asour ELECTED representatives now seem to have little influence on major decisions it is time for a change in the rules of parliment so that our parliamentary democracy is reaffirmed.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
